summary.name: Virtual Ecstasy
summary.description: A deck for those who want to strip away every inhibition and surrender to a long-distance game where everything is allowed. Fingers type, voice commands, the body obeys. Pleasure is real, even if the screen stands between you.

quests.content: Get completely naked, take a faceless photo and send it to your partner with the message: 'This body is all yours.'
Send a voice message telling your partner everything you want them to do to you with their fingers. No filter.
Write an explicit scene where you are forced to masturbate on their command, describing everything.
Film a short video (5–10 sec) where you touch yourself over your underwear, looking into the camera without saying a word.
Write a message describing exactly what you’d like to do with your tongue to your partner right now.
Record an audio where you’re masturbating and moaning. No words, just real sounds.
Write step by step what you're doing while pleasuring yourself thinking about your partner.
Film a short video where you're masturbating with one hand while keeping the camera fixed on your genitals with the other.
Order your partner to come while watching your video or photo. Tell them what you want to see happen.
Write a domination or submission fantasy where your partner is your sexual object.
Write a dirty short monologue describing an orgasm during penetration. Don’t use euphemisms.
Record a video of yourself climaxing or realistically simulating orgasm, and send it to your partner immediately.
Write what you would do to your partner if they were tied up naked in front of you, completely at your mercy.
Send a photo of your body messy after orgasm, even if it's just a partial view.
Come while listening to your partner's audio or watching their video. Afterwards, just send: 'Yours.'
Write your ultimate dirty talk: the filthiest thing you'd whisper in their ear during sex.
Film your naked body while you slowly caress yourself after orgasm.
Write a message that includes the words 'dirty', 'hunger', 'wet', 'command', and 'inside'. It must make sense.
End the game with an obscene promise you'll fulfill next time you see each other—black on white.
